AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Soldier member
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is member of SOLDIER, Shin-Ra's Special Force.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is member of SOLDIER, Shin-Ra's Special Force.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Soldier member
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is member of SOLDIER, Shin-Ra's Special Force.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Shin-Ra paramilitary soldier
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] it's part of the Shin-Ra Paramilitary Forces, the regular Shin-Ra army.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Shin-Ra paramilitary officer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] it's an officer in the Shin-Ra Paramilitary Forces.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Shin-Ra paramilitary commando
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] it's a Commando on the Shin-Ra Paramilitary Forces,their missions are always secret, they usually work with the Turks.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Shin-Ra turks member
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] it's member of the Investigation Sector of the General Affairs Department or the "Turks" on the Shin-Ra Public Safety Department,they are basically spies and their missions are always secret.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Shin-Ra civil engineer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a Civil Engineer for the Shin-Ra Company.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Shin-Ra scientist
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a Scientist for the Shin-Ra Company.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Shin-Ra manager
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a company manager on Shin-Ra Company.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Gaia singer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a known singer on Gaia.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Midgar police officer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a police officer on Midgar.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Construction worker
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a Construction Worker on Gaia.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Doctor
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a Doctor on Gaia.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Shin-Ra miner
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a Miner working for the Shin-Ra Company.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Shin-Ra space engineer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a Space Engineer for the Shin-Ra Company.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Shin-Ra farmer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a Farmer for the Shin-Ra Company.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Gaia sculptor
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a famous Sculptor from Gaia Planet.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Shin-Ra executive
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a Shin-Ra Company Executive.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Midgar sectors born
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] born on the Shin-Ra Company metropolis of Midgar on Gaia. HECAP had a good childhood by living on the upper sector plates of Midgar.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Midgar slums born
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] born on the Shin-Ra Company metropolis of Midgar on Gaia. HECAP had a bad childhood by living on the slums under the sector plates of Midgar.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Midgar slums born
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] born on the Shin-Ra Company metropolis of Midgar on Gaia. HECAP had a hard childhood by living on the contaminated slums under the sector plates of Midgar .

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Junon born
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] born on the Shin-Ra Company coastal fortress-city of Junon on Gaia. HECAP had a hard childhood because of the military education given there to childs.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Robot
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a robot.
